00025 #ifndef EOS_KERNEL_PROCESS_H
00026 #define EOS_KERNEL_PROCESS_H
00027 
00028 #include "EOSLuaScript.h"
00029 #include "EOSScriptManager.h"
00030 #include "EOSLuaThisRestorer.h"
00031 #include "EOSMessage.h"
00032 
00033 #define  MAXCHUNKLENGTH  512
00034 
00035 
00038 class EOSProcess : public EOSLuaScript
00039     {
00040     public:
00042         EOSProcess(EOSLuaEnvironment* luaEnvPtr, EOSScriptManager* scriptManagerPtr, const char* processName, const char* scriptName) : EOSLuaScript(luaEnvPtr, scriptName)
00043             {
00044             this->scriptManager = scriptManagerPtr;
00045             luaScriptBuffer* scriptBuffer = scriptManagerPtr->requestScript(scriptName);
00046             if(scriptBuffer != NULL)
00047                 {
00048                 this->valid = compileBuffer((unsigned char*)scriptBuffer->bufferPtr, scriptBuffer->bufferSize);
00049                 }
00050             else
00051                 printf("EOSProcess: '%s': NULL scriptBuffer!!\n", processName);
00052             this->thisProcessName = processName;
00053             this->active      = false;
00054             this->initialized = false;
00055             this->garbaged    = false;
00056             pushProcessName();
00057             }
00058 
00060         ~EOSProcess()
00061             {
00062             if(initialized) cleanup();
00063             clearProcessName();
00064             }
00065 
00067         bool init()    { if(valid && selectScriptFunction("init"))    { go(); return true; } return false; }
00069         bool update()  { if(valid && selectScriptFunction("update"))  { go(); return true; } return false; }
00071         bool cleanup() { if(valid && selectScriptFunction("cleanup")) { go(); return true; } return false; }
00073         void processMessage(EOSMessage* message);
00074 
00076         bool isActive()             { return this->active; }
00078         bool setActive(bool status);
00080         bool isGarbaged()           { return this->garbaged; }
00082         void garbage()              { this->garbaged = true; this->active = false; }
00083 
00084     private:
00086         void pushProcessName();
00088         void clearProcessName();
00089         //
00090         char luaChunk[MAXCHUNKLENGTH + 1]; 
00091         const char* thisProcessName;       
00092         bool active;                       
00093         bool valid;                        
00094         bool initialized;                  
00095         bool garbaged;                     
00096         EOSScriptManager* scriptManager;   
00097     };
00098 
00099 
00100 #endif
